resources.string: Wallpapers are stored on Cloud Server. Please connect to Internet and try again.
Download completed successfully Picture is located at
Nice choice their! Would like this wall cropped or set as is?
Some firmware do not support wallpaper cropping out of the box...You may need to download an gallery app first that supports this!
Picture set as wallpaper successfully Go to Home screen and check it.
Sorry, previous action wasn\'t actually applied, because it seems there\'s no picture. Check your Internet connection and try again.
Error while downloading wallpapers info. Try again later.

If Drywall contains media that you wish to be removed for legal reasons, Please contact the developer with reasonable reason to be removed and correctful action will be taken. All wallpapers provided by Drywall are free and can be freely managed through the cloud at any time.
It appears your device does not have an active internet connection it. This application is useless without it thus will now close.
